about_the_game:
Soundtracks of the final credits "Monsters of Little Haven" performed by "Pomni Imya Svoe".

  • Pomni imya svoyo - Budet pet xolodnyj odinokij veter
  • Pomni Imya Svoe - Slepye bluzhdayut nochyu (I. Brodskij)
  • Pomni Imya Svoyo - Snitsya (R. Rozhdestvenskij, D. Kachmara)
  • Pomni Imya Svoe - Ni zavtra, ni segodnya, nikogda (V. Tok)
  • Pomni Imya Svoe - My budem zhit (M. Frolenko)
  • Pomni Imya Svoe - Mamino more (V. Tok)
  • Pomni Imya Svoe - Zhestokost (K. Fandeeva)
  • Pomni Imya Svoe - Tam, gde nas net (K. Fandeeva)
